availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky, physician. Clarksburg, Virginia native. Married to Jane R. Ellis McGranaghan on December 4, 1845. Father of Anna C. McGranaghan, Jennie E. McGranaghan, Lydia E. McGranaghan, William H. McGranaghan, Frank G. McGranaghan, and LuAmy McGranaghan. Physician in Maysville in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 36A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 47.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, Ward 2, p. 13-14.
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, (Richmond, KY: Madison County Courthouse), film no. 000281843, p. 96.
George Norbury Mackenzie and Nelson Osgood Rhoades, eds., Colonial Families of the United States of America, Vol. VI (1912, Reprinted, Baltimore: Genealogical Publishing Co., Inc., 1966), 48.
